definitions.definition: Regard for others, both natural and moral without regard for oneself; devotion to the interests of others; brotherly kindness.
Action or behaviour that benefits another or others at some cost to the performer.

main_definition: Regard for others, both natural and moral without regard for oneself; devotion to the interests of others; brotherly kindness.
secondary_definitions: ( biology , sociobiology ) Action or behaviour that benefits another or others at some cost to the performer.
